title.narrative: Eco-zones for secure jobs in the countryside

description.narrative: To the Regionalna zaklada za lokalni razvoj ZAMAH (Regional Foundation for Local development Zamah). The project aims to create conditions for sustainable development in Banovina. The targeted involvement of the minority Serbian population, both socially neglected, will lead to entrepreneurship in organic farming. Through education and production in organic farming, beneficiaries of the project will launch the model of organic production of honey, they will acquire the necessary knowledge and skills, and part of the financial resources will be used for the expansion and strengthening of the successful model of social entrepreneurship in the community

participating-org.narrative: Regional Foundation for Local Development Zamah
